channel.title: Slider on RCT
channel.description: Recent content in Slider on RCT

item.title: Children Development
item.description: Empower the children in distress and difficult situation through Non-Formal Education, evening tuition centres and sports club.

item.title: Environmental Development
item.description: Promoting community health and clean environment through solid waste management and health-related programmes for ensuring healthy living.

item.title: Health and Aged Care
item.description: Enhance the needy people for sustainable development through community mobilization and organization to provide health care and accommodation.

item.title: Women Empowerment
item.description: Facilitate the women to be empowered through the formation of self-help groups and womenâ€™s rights education and safety and entrepreneurial training.

item.title: Youth Development
item.description: Educate the youth for taking up the role of leadership in society through carrier guidance and leadership training programmes.
